text: Michael Levitt, (; born 9 May 1947) is a South African biophysicist. He is a professor of structural biology at Stanford University, a position he has held since 1987. Levitt received the 2013 Nobel Prize in Chemistry. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:South African scientists Category:American biologists Category:American physicists Category:British biologists Category:British physicists Category:Israeli scientists Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from Pretoria
title: Michael Levitt
